name: AbSUrd - Close to Distantly [LP]
description:
AbSUrd. 
Close to Distantly Vinyl Edition (2012)

A1. Intro	
A2. Somewhere Else	
A3. As The Loot Bag Laughs
A4. Muddy Perdition	
A5. Thin Air w. Bleubird 
A6. Shadows Of Reindeer
A7. Beyond The Knowledge	
B1. Ordinary 
B2. Human Weakness Lead Astray	
B3. A Lesson In Skinning Goats
B4. The H	
B5. Not Need... Lantern	
B6. Even Sultans Fall 
B7. Outro

-

Additional vocals by:
Babel Fishh, Bleubird, Ceschi Ramos, James P Honey, jamesreindeer, Univac.

Additional instrumentation by jamesreindeer & Nadia D' Alo.

Handmade by AbSUrd.

Limited to 250 copies.

Cooler Than Cucumbers Records.

name: AbSUrd - Close to Distantly [CD]
description:
AbSUrd. 
Close to Distantly (cd version 2011)

01. Intro 
02. Somewhere Else 
03. As the Loot Bag Laughs 
04. Natural Forks 
05. Black Sea Life Absorber 
06. Muddy Perdition 
07. Thin Air 
08. Shadows of Reindeer 
09. Beyond the Knowledge 
10. Ordinary 
11. Human Weakness Lead Astray 
12. A Lesson in Skinning Goats 
13. the H 
14. Not Need Lantern 
15. Perpetual Questions Pursue 
16. Outro 
17. Even Sultans Fall

-

Additional vocals by Babel Fishh, Bleubird, Ceschi Ramos, Filkoe, James P Honey, jamesreindeer, Papervehicle & Univac.

Additional instrumentation by jamesreindeer & Nadia D' Alo.

Handmade by AbSUrd.

Handcrafted limited edition to 300.

Decorative Stamp release.

name: AbSUrd - [7" picture disc]
description:
AbSUrd. 
[7" vinyl picture disc 2009]

A. Black Sea Life Absorber
B. Untouched

Guest vocals on Black Sea Life Absorber by: 
Papervehicle (Mildew, Edison, Home, Beastmaster) , James P Honey, Filkoe 

-

Artwork by Albane Simon.

Limited to 300.

Cooler Than Cucumbers Records.

name: Murmur Breeze - Foreshore Reverie [LP]
description:
Murmur Breeze 
Foreshore Reverie Vinyl Edition (2012)

A1. Foreshore Reverie 
A2. Cabin Flesh Laid Yesterday 
A3. A Picture With Idol 
A4. Flame Like Projection 
A5. Catch the Mirage 
A6. Float 
B1. Lude & Meditation 
B2. Deer Head in Bear Trap
B3. Waterboard Funfare 
B4. Nativity Play Massacre 
B5. Back Lit and Cripplingly Seductive 
B6. Third Light

-

Additional vocals by: 
Mildew, jamesreindeer & Babel Fishh.

Artwork/Collage by James P Honey.

Limited to 300 copies.

Cooler Than Cucumbers/Decorative Stamp

name: Murmur Breeze - Float [7"]
